tech_news.title: SteamOS vs. Windows on dedicated GPUs: It’s complicated, but Windows has an edge - Ars Technica

tech_news.title: Bethesda boss and RPG lover Todd Howard names his 2025 Game of the Year, and it shouldn't come as a big surprise - Eurogamer

tech_news.title: The Apple AirPods 4 with ANC are at their lowest price - The Verge

tech_news.title: ‘The Chair Company’ Is A Show About How Fun It Is To Use The Computer - Defector
tech_news.description: Throughout the first season of The Chair Company, the protagonist Ron Trosper (Tim Robinson) goes to many places that he should not. He chases unsettling men and curious leads through parking lots, dingy apartment buildings, hoarder houses, government records…
